185534680.review:
A very short (story takes an hour or two to complete) but fun, weird and weirdly heartfelt and charming story about [strike]an octopus pretending to be a human[/strike],a normal human man that is a very real father. My only complaint is I wish the main story was longer, as it feels like it ended as quickly as it began, but it still is a game that takes up a place in my heart, likely due to the strange heartfelt joy it gives me that I can't really put into words.

It also makes me reminisce on memories from my youth (teenage years) of watching Let’s Players rage and yell their voices dead at this fictional octopus father, I mean human father. 10/10

185515296.review: Initially, I didn't really like, it but it grew on my by the end. The controls are abysmal, and you're likely to struggle through some of the puzzles. However, I understand why, and it shouldn't be take too seriously.

185461354.review: Игра ужасно неудобная в управлении, так ещё и задания такие, которые мышкой за*б*шься делать, когда я в детстве смотрел летсплеи от блогеров, то я думал что там легче с управлением, как оказалось я очень сильно ошибался, играть можно устать уже за 10 минут игры на самом деле, как только начинается она, как по мне игра не стоит даже копейки, не то что рубля, благо я поиграл в неё меньше чем 2 часа, из-за чего мне вернули средства)

185367873.review: Зашёл в игру, подумал: «Ну, я же взрослый человек, что сложного в том, чтобы быть отцом семейства?» А потом мои щупальца начали хватать всё подряд – чашки, стулья, тёщу… Попытка просто налить кофе превратилась в разрушение кухни, поход в магазин — в эпизод из фильма-катастрофы. Но главное, что семья всё равно любит тебя, даже если ты осьминог в костюме. Это игра, где быть папой – значит превратить каждую бытовую задачу в эпический хаос. Однозначно рекомендую)

184661005.review: I first played this game with my mother-in-law on PS4 and we were both struggling with the controls while just busting out laughing. You will stumble through the first level or two until you start you get the controls and your tentacle legs under control, the bad controls are part of the charm - being an octopus pretending to be a human and all. This game has it all really. It's unique and charming, funny and challenging, great music and good story. Worth it at full price - a steal if bought on sale.

184291890.review:
Es literalmente el peor juego de la historia. Yo me imaginé que sería como un Just Die Already, culpa mía porque no tiene absolutamente nada que ver, es un juego de puzzles más o menos que es más difícil que cualquier Dark Souls.
Cinco minutos me llevó subir las escaleras mecánicas y más de veinte minutos la escalada del pulpo para nada, ahí me quede, juego horrible, nefasto como el que más, no te lo recomiendo ni aunque fuese gratis.
It's literally the worst game ever. I imagined that it would be like a Just Die Already, my fault because it has absolutely nothing to do with it, it is a puzzle game more or less that is more difficult than any Dark Souls.
It took me five minutes to climb the escalators and more than twenty minutes to climb the octopus for nothing, there I stayed, horrible game, nefarious as the most, I do not recommend it even if it was free.

183912154.review:
A fun, short game, definitely worth getting at its sale price.

Alternative control style games like this and snake pass are a fun change up from other platformers.

The campaign is very short, I finished it in about 2 hours but will take a little longer if you go for collectables.

The story and characters are charming and it's a fun experience.

183841556.review: It's fun, frustrating, and cute. Mine has been a little glitchy where the objectives won't show up until I die so that was annoying but it's nice so far. I got it sale since it was only $3.

183720606.review: It's a cute game, pretty short, with a fun story.

183631346.review: Octodad is a super fun physics game where you have to hide your secret identity from your family. It's a ton of fun trying to manipulate an awkward squid's body through a grocery store. I highly recommend this game to people who enjoy small and humorous games, but this does require a controller to make the game playable.

183574772.review: The controls are hard, but you can get used to them. Generally a good game.
